body.p:
Owingsville Ky Feb 10th 1862
to his Excelency B MaGoffin
Sir

I know the parties in which the fine is against Crain & Lightfoot they are Both Law Biding men and and Good Sitizens and Gentlemn this was throu predudice and any favor you may Confer and therin will be thankfully Recd
